name: A set of sports fields - Set sport playground
description: The model is made in the 2014 max and resave to version max 2014. All playgrounds are made in natural size and proportions in accordance with the rules of sport and the dimensions of the sport. The scene consists of a ready-to-use elements. The elements are optimized for large scenes and made Low Poly technique. But they can be used for close angles. Mesh fencing and nets on sports equipment is made using textures and Opasity card. All objects in the scene have unique names, and names of materials. Each ele Show more
